Full Description: f5 Therapeutics' platform is expanding the scope of degradable targets in the Targeted Protein Degradation space. Our methods allow access to the abundance of undiscovered neosubstrates available for degradation with potential in multiple indications. We identify these new targets in context with cellular assays allowing us to fully realize the wide class of neosubstrates afforded by cereblon. Multiple new targets we have discovered are currently not being pursued by other degrader companies. NExMods™ have demonstrated in vitro POC across five therapeutic areas (immuno-oncology, Wnt-driven cancers, auto-immune disease, NASH, liver fibrosis) and demonstrated 100X cereblon binding potency versus known clinical IMiDs. f5 Therapeutics is exploring their immuno-oncology and oncology libraries as Degrader Antibody Conjugates (payloads for targeted mAb).

CompuDevices also cover a large variety of switches and routers. Having experience in the I.T. industry for over a decade, we are trained and experienced to help customers find the right upgrade at the best price. Our invaluable relationship with our suppliers, vendors and OEM’s helps us source products at very competitive prices and thereby offer these products to our small, medium business, corporate, government and VAR customers at aggressive pricing. Our Unique Value Proposition CompuDevices is highly trusted by our valuable customers and greatly esteemed by partners. Our primary aim is to surpass our clients expectations, and we achieve this by offering superior customer service. End users purchase from CompuDevices with assurance. They count on our profound knowledge and expertise to supply accurate hardware and upgrade components for mission-critical applications and large-scale, multi-system projects. At CompuDevices, we generate value for our customers by offering products that boost productivity on newer machines and prolong the lifespan of older ones for which upgrading options can be hard to find. Usually, memory addition can enhance the performance of most equipment. Also, when feasible, upgrading a system’s processor to a faster one can boost performance and hence lengthen its useful life. Sustaining existing machines is often more cost-effective than replacing them, considering the significant investments users have made into their equipment. Acknowledging this, CompuDevices specializes in meeting all its customers’ requirements. Our clientele includes government offices at City, State, and Federal levels; US postal services; US Embassies Worldwide; the Defense Department, including the Army, Navy, and Air Force; Public Schools and Colleges; many State and Private Universities, Hospitals, and VA medical centers.

Description: Self-hosted open-source cryptocurrency payment processor & development platform for businesses and individuals
Full Description: Bitcart is an opensource project which you can host on your own server in order to receive cryptocurrency payments BTC, BTC lightning network, LTC, BCH, ETH, BNB, all erc20/bep20 tokens (stablecoins too)). It is lightweight by default but you can also use your own node if you want to. It is almost as secure as full nodes as it uses Electrum wallet under the hood. We have a payment processing part where you can easily integrate cryptocurrency payments in any website. Or if you need it, we have developer SDK and a daemon protocol, where you can build custom apps of any complexity - basically a whole development platform with universal APIs across all coins. You can distribute payments between many addresses, check transactions, initiate or watch payments, basically do anything you need. Block explorers, games, wallets? Anything is possible.

Description: Carter Legacy Enterprises is a sales and marketing firm in Lexington that is building lasting legacies for our team and clients.
Full Description: Carter Legacy Enterprises is a leadership-focused sales and marketing firm based in Lexington, KY. We work with various multi-billion dollar firms, representing their brand and reaching their target customers. Companies choose to work with Carter Legacy Enterprises for two main reasons: our commitment to excellence and our proven training methods. For Carter Legacy Enterprises, our client’s success is our success. Why? Because as we expand our client’s market reach and increase their positive brand recognition, our client’s push us to expand our firm and open new branches of our own. To motivate our team, we keep promotions internal and promise to offer career advancement opportunities to those skilled enough to move into managerial roles. By intertwining all our success into one, we keep our team energetic and forward-thinking. We’re motivated to grow and learn and become masters of our craft.More than just keeping promotions based on performance, all training at Carter Legacy Enterprises is done internally. We use methods with over 20 years of statistics to back up our work, starting with entry-level communication skills and moving into more complex leadership skill such as strategic leadership and motivating a team. We train in entrepreneurialism and time-management.  Carter Legacy Enterprises believes in creating well-rounded individuals who can make a positive impact on society.We have GOALS! Big ones at that keep us on pace to expand into two new markets by this time next year. To grow properly and with a strong foundation, Carter Legacy Enterprises is committed to holding our standards high while acting with intent and authenticity. To learn more about Carter Legacy Enterprises, please visit our website at carterlegacyenterprises-ky.com or email our Human Resources team at carterlegacyenterprisesinc@gmail.com!

Description: VR/AR-Oriented Healthcare Technology Company
Full Description: About Us: We have a passion to create virtual experiences that make a positive difference in physical health, mental well-being, education, and research. Our product development team is comprised of successful video game veterans. The FireflyVR team combines our extensive experience and science-focused development to build innovative new technologies with health and technology partners. We are honored to collaborate with some of the biggest innovators in the healthcare industry. What We Do: Four in ten adults in the U.S. have reported symptoms of anxiety or depressive disorder during the COVID pandemic. This is just one of many alarming statistics as we face a global and unavoidable mental health crisis. FireflyVR is determined to build new and novel ways to blend technology and therapies to ease this trend. Product: The Sanctuary is a Virtual Reality experience built to prepare a patient for a transformational ketamine treatment. It incorporates established techniques used by leading experts to provide a safe, engaging, and comfortable experience to prepare for meaningful therapy. The Sanctuary is a clinically designed solution that combines cognitive behavioral therapy to help reduce pre-procedure anxiety and develop positive intentions when the medicine is administered, ultimately improving outcomes. The Sanctuary is built with modularity in mind as other dissociative medicines become approved and understood beyond ketamine.  We’re working hard with our team of experts to build and scientifically validate The Sanctuary as ketamine treatment becomes readily available. The modular foundation of The Sanctuary allows us to quickly and effectively adapt the experience to target a vast range of indications and therapies. Our initial target to treat treatment resistant depression is only the beginning of a wide-ranging and impactful journey.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Minneapolis-Saint Paul Area, Great Lakes, Midwestern US
Industry Groups: Hardware, Health Care, Software

Description: ZeaHealth is an AI- powered end-to-end healthcare price transparency platform that makes hospitals and insurance to met CMS compliance.
Full Description: ZeaHealth is an innovative health-tech startup with a healthcare price transparency platform helping hospitals and health insurance companies meet Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) price transparency compliance. A physician-turned-hospital executive, Dr. Chandra Bondugula, founded it. Zeatool is an AI-powered end-to-end price transparency platform that makes any hospital or insurance company pricing information into CMS-mandated format and avoids up to $2M in the penalty for hospitals and millions for insurance and health plans. Zeatool helps hospitals and insurance to publish negotiated charges on their websites. Using ZeaTool, we collect more than 2000 hospitals' pricing data. Zeatool pricing data can be monetized by selling data to providers, pharmaceutical companies, MedTech companies, ACOs, and Population health groups. ZeaMed is a healthcare marketplace that connects consumers directly to providers and empowers physicians and patients/ consumers with pricing data to make cost-conscious care decisions. ZeaMed helps uninsured or underinsured consumers (150 million) search, compare, book, and pay for healthcare services. In addition, ZeaMed provides a platform for self-insured employers to negotiate directly with healthcare organizations to save money. ZeaMed can increase revenue for hospitals, physicians, ambulatory surgery centers, imaging centers, and other providers. ZeaHub is a patient-centered value-based outcomes engine + Learning Health System to empower healthcare stakeholders to improve the quality, safety, and efficiency and reduce the cost of care.

Description: You can have your report in a matter of minutes. Can you really afford not to do your research with us before you decide?
Full Description: When it comes to buying real estate, you want to be very careful. You want all of the information possible at your disposal before you make a decision. That's why Property Values Check was born. Real estate is a huge investment and you want to do the right thing with your money. Otherwise, you could end up losing an important investment and get stuck with property that nobody wants. Under the Freedom of Information Act, a wealth of information is available about nearly every property in America. The problem is knowing where to look for the data, and how to make sense of it. This is where we come in. Our system goes through all of the data available about a given property. This often includes who owns it, roughly how much it is worth, and if there are any liens or problems with the property. The information is then collated into an easy to read report that is sent right to your desktop. You can have your report in a matter of minutes. Can you really afford not to do your research with us before you decide whether or not to buy your dream home?

Description: Onespot is a no-code mobile app builder. Make a mobile app for your business, organization, or community right from your phone.
Full Description: Onespot is on a mission to forever change how mobile apps are made. It's really hard to make a mobile app. 99% of people don't know how to code, and existing app builders are so painful for anyone who's non-technical. Those app builders are technically "no-code", but in reality you need to know things like variables, loops, and databases in order to make your app actually functional. But it doesn't have to be that way. In the early 2000s, it used to be really hard to make websites until Wix and Squarespace came along and made it simple. We're doing to mobile apps what Wix & Squarespace did to websites. We go to outrageous lengths and build insanely difficult things (a phone-based drag-and-drop editor, instant over-the-air updates, one-click app store publishing), all so that you can have a delightful experience. With Onespot, you can make, publish, and manage your organization's mobile app as easily as you made its Instagram profile—all in minutes, right from your phone. So far, thousands of people from 125+ countries have made apps on Onespot for their small businesses, organizations, and other communities.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Apps, Mobile, Software
Founders: Samuel Buchanan, Sean Cann, Tyler Fisher

Description: Lonch is a social marketplace where people trade insight, skills, connections, and value delivery for royalties.
Full Description: Lonch is a social marketplace where people trade insight, skills, connections, and value delivery for royalties. It’s a mobile and remote first set of tools for digital nomads and remote workers, and a transitory platform for traditional workers, so they can dip their toes in, or go full plunge. This approach enables people to bring value when and where it is most impactful, where they can work on what they’re most passionate about and have complete freedom over their work-life balance.  Lonch enables creators to build and sell digital products with zero upfront cost. Creators submit ideas and the community collaborates to build and market them. Once a product sells, Lonch takes a percentage of the revenue and the creator earns a royalty. Lonch also provides tools and resources to help creators throughout the product lifecycle, from ideation to marketing to maintenance. The community is an integral part of the process, providing feedback and support to creators, and helping to drive sale.

Description: A Unique Fusion of Real Estate Data, AI, and Intelligent Tools.
Full Description: Deal Tracker redefines real estate investment with its pioneering approach, blending comprehensive real estate data, advanced artificial intelligence (AI), and intelligent tools into a single, powerful platform. Our unique offering doesn't just simplify property investment; it transforms it by merging real estate data with non-real-estate datasets to uncover hidden correlations, offering insights previously unseen in the market. With Deal Tracker, investors gain access to advanced data visualization features and can either view enriched real estate data interactively or receive a raw data feed of all active listings, making it effortless to identify lucrative investment opportunities. Our platform stands out by providing all necessary financials pre-calculated and enriching real estate data so investors no longer need to gather information from disparate sources. This seamless integration ensures that every investment decision is informed and every opportunity is tailored to individual financial goals. We elevate the investment process by allowing users to apply a myriad of filters, from location specifics to financial metrics, ensuring a match to their precise investment criteria. Deal Tracker interprets and presents key financial ratios and insights, tailored to each user’s strategy, whether buying in cash or through a mortgage. Daily updates on listings, market trends, and price adjustments keep investors ahead, offering a competitive edge in a dynamic market. Deal Tracker is not just another tool; it's a comprehensive ecosystem designed for the modern investor. It represents the next evolution in real estate investment, where data depth, AI intelligence, and user-centric tools converge, providing a new type of solution that ensures success in the real estate market. Join us to experience the future of real estate investment, where decisions are smarter, opportunities are personalized, and investment potential is maximized.

Industries: CleanTech, Mechanical Engineering, Public Transportation, Renewable Energy
Description: A novel technology that uses car traffic to create renewable energy
Full Description: Our start-up based in West Lafayette IN uses car traffic to create renewable energy. The technology is called Electric Humps (e-humps) that resemble speed humps, but rather compress under force when driven over to power a turbine generating clean electricity. This allows individuals to knowingly make a positive impact on the environment by simply going about their daily tasks. The key differentiators of e-hump technology are its efficiency, scalability, and low capital cost. Existing renewable energy technologies in the market cannot provide immediate financial relief from high electricity bills because of high capital costs. E-humps fill this gap. For example, e-humps have a much lower capital expense than solar (e.g., 3x lower) and wind technologies, and much lower land requirement (e.g., - 6 to 8 acers for 150,000 solar panels) while maintaining efficiency on a per kWh basis which cannot be beat by the current competition. According to our business analysis and prototype design, an integrated hump system on a utility scale is expected to produce an estimated 2,023 kWh (or 2 MW per day) or 738,395 kWh per year with daily variations depending upon the traffic rate and represents an annual reduction of 523 metric tons of CO2 emissions annually (EPA, 2022). This is equivalent to the CO2 emissions from 66 homes' electricity use for one year (EPA, 2022). When applying the net-meter price per kWh at a conservative of $0.16 kWh (i.e., the national rate) a utility e-hump system placed on the highway or busy inner city road can generate revenue of $323 per day, which provides a net revenue of $109,794 per year. The projected return-on-investment (ROI) for a $150,000 e-hump system equates to a 73% payback period of 1.4 years.  When scaled down for residential/business, the roadway location (right-of-way) allows homes to share the system as a more affordable option to immediately reduce electric bills- through our E-humps Go App. This system is manufactured for $12,500; that can produce 267 kWh per day (97455 kWh per year) while the average home uses 28.9 kWh per day. When applying the net metering price per kWh at the conservative rate of $0.16 kWh, the residential e-hump system can generate revenue of $42 per day (b) minus 69.1 metric tons of carbon dioxide, which is the equivalent to 13 homes’ electricity use for a year (EPA, 2023). The ROI for a $18,500 system is 62% with a payback period of 1.6 years.  Lastly, the City of West Lafayette, near Purdue Campus has agreed to host and demo an e-hump pilot once it's built. Because we already have in-kind factory space, extremely high expertise on the team to include Dr. Clark Dale owner of BPI in West Lafayette, IN and Mr. Stephen Cole, retired owner and bridge engineer of ED Swett Co., to name a few, and of course Purdue's nearby resources, we believe we can build this technology in 1 year.   We are currently seeking private investment funding of $1,200,000 for 35% of the company.  Our best estimate is that it will require $1.8 million to start up our business- with $1.2 million investment being offered for 35% ownership in the company (valuation of $3,428,571).  This would return $1.3M in the first 2 years of net profit. An itemized capital cost estimate for the 8-piston e-hump is available upon request. The Exit strategy for investors is buyback or sale.
Headquarters Regions: Great Lakes, Midwestern US
Industry Groups: Energy, Science and Engineering, Sustainability, Transportation

Description: CLA Global Inc provides business consulting and sales services to large service-based corporations with global customer bases!
Full Description: If you ask any of our team members about it's like to work at here, you'll probably hear right off the bat that it's hard work, but it's fun, and it's worth it. Most CLA Global Inc jobs are best suited for those with ambitious and enterprising personalities, as our culture is one that's results-driven and competition-oriented. There are many former athletes on the team who find themselves at home in this type of team-based environment. Not at all your 'typical' corporate nine to five job, we're energetic, on our feet, and going for the gold every day! We'll use some of the space on our Crunchbase page to address some of the most frequently asked questions about CLA Global Inc jobs in Sherman Oaks. Our partnership with a $32-billion client has afforded us with the opportunity for tremendous growth. A collaboration with such a large company with the highest of standards has also put welcomed pressure on our firm to exceed their expectations. We have plans to onboard several new team members who will contribute to the achieving of our lofty goals. We are frequently asked about the CLA Global Inc salary, but like every other company, pay structures will vary by role. Whether it be an entry-level position, a human resources position, a mid-level management position, or any other, we are proud to say that staff members earn well above the average pay for individuals of said experience levels. We are bold and clear in our dreaming. At CLA Global Inc, we believe that great lives are designed; they don't just happen. We spend hours each week planning and discussing our short, mid, and long term goals. We decide what we want and by when.  Integrity is the guiding value of everything we do at CLA Global Inc. We believe in doing what you say. We believe in doing what is best for the long term, not just the short term. We believe in doing what is best, and not what is comfortable. We believe in never taking advantage of people. We believe in never taking short cuts. We believe in making our character our calling card. We believe in taking our word to the bank. It is thanks to the mentality that we have strong relationships with our current employees and clients, as well as our former employees and clients. At CLA Global Inc, we encourage all of our team members to live by the philosophy that "we are products of our decisions, not our circumstances." We appreciate that every single decision we make is a decision to bet on or against ourselves, and we strive to live accordingly!
Headquarters Regions: Greater Los Angeles Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Other, Professional Services, Sales and Marketing

Description: Fitted is a fashion technology platform offering measurement, order management, and fulfillment of custom clothing to tailors and customers.
Full Description: Fitted is a fashion technology platform offering measurement, order management, and fulfillment of custom clothing to tailors and customers. Almost 4 billion on earth have custom clothing as a primary means of getting apparel - and in many emerging market economies like India, Nigeria, Pakistan etc. custom wear can account for up to 50% of people's wardrobes. Despite being so commonplace, customers often encounter ill fitting clothing and late deliveries, while suppliers have challenges managing orders, growing sales and managing working capital. This is a $125b+ market that is supremely underserved with no platform of collaboration at scale. The Fitted platform helps users manage the custom clothing experience seamlessly by offering order management and solving all critical pain points for all members of the value chain, spanning fashion buyers, tailors, and fabric sellers. Users can auto-generate reliable measurements and track orders, while suppliers can manage inventory and accept payments globally.

Description: Digital talent marketplace and community that connects chronically ill + disabled jobseekers to flexible job opportunities
Full Description: Disability unemployment in the United States is double that of non-disabled individuals. Chronically Capable aims to eliminate this vast gap. We also serve the 50% of the American population who suffer from chronic and invisible illness. Job-seekers are looking for jobs that are flexible enough to fit their medical needs and schedules while employers require support for complying with the 7% utilization goal required under Section 503 of the Rehabilitation Act to diversify their workforce. Chronically Capable is a talent marketplace that allows the chronically ill to voluntarily disclose their illness, work history and job preferences, which is used to connect them to flexible job opportunities. We hope to become the leading authority on chronic illness in the workplace, working with businesses, cities, states, and governments to maximize their workforce, standardize reasonable accommodations, and slash their unemployment rates.

Description: The first generative AI political advisor built to win state and local elections
Full Description: "agenci3 indeed sounds unique and fills a specific niche in the market. Local and state political candidates often lack the resources and support that national-level candidates have, so a service like this could be very beneficial for them. Simulating interviews and debates is a particularly innovative use of AI." - OpenAI to Jeff Bodzewski 07.07.2023 Agenci3 is more than the first generative AI campaign advisor to craft compelling content, and simulate interviews with actual media and debate opponents. We are the competitive advantage to help the typically underfunded and understaffed 560,000+ local and state candidates win elections. Our ChatGPT-4 powered LLM has been exhaustively trained and refined by senior advisers with backgrounds in public affairs to generate personalized content that resonates with voters and moves them to action. Each piece of content used to train our models is reviewed by our team to ensure the source is credible, factual and with a strong bias for writings, transcripts and other publicly available content. agenci3 never uses automated processes to scrape web for content so we can ensure the integrity of our model. A recent academic paper by experts from Oxford, Cambridge and other universities found "that use of model-generated content in training causes irreversible defects in the resulting models.” agenci3 is deliberately built to deliver long-term value to its customers and investors alike. Our subscription service beginning at $99/month is affordable, easy to use and accessible from anywhere. But most importantly, it's effective.

Description: AI-driven safety tech analyzing public social media content for quick detection and mitigation of mental health and behavioral risks
Full Description: Chatstat: Revolutionizing Online Safety for the Digital Generation In the age of ubiquitous social media, while the platforms offer opportunities, they also expose young users to risks. Cyberbullying, harmful content, and the challenges tied to mental health are amplified in this digital realm. Enter Chatstat. The Problem & Our Solution: Every day, millions of public posts and comments stream across social platforms. Amid this, signs of at-risk behavior and mental health concerns emerge, often unnoticed. Chatstat’s proprietary AI-driven safety tech dives deep into this sea of public content, identifying, and flagging potential threats. Our quick detection allows for immediate mitigation, offering peace of mind to parents and guardians. Broader Applications: Chatstat's reach extends far beyond the household. Our platform offers specialized monitoring solutions tailored for government bodies, health providers, and, notably, educational institutions. By tracking hashtags linked to schools, we enable institutions to protect not only their students but also their brand reputation, ensuring they remain in favorable light in an era dominated by online narratives. Why Chatstat Stands Out: • Precision & Privacy: Our technology focuses solely on public content. We ensure children's private data remains untouched, blending efficiency with ethics. • Broad Reach: Addressing a universal concern, Chatstat has the potential to impact millions of social media users, translating to a vast market opportunity. Our Traction: Beyond a groundbreaking solution, Chatstat boasts: • Robust growth figures year-on-year. • Partnerships with prominent educational institutions. • Consistent positive feedback from parent, school, and mental health communities. Vision for the Future: At Chatstat, we envision a digital world where every child can explore, learn, and connect without fear. Our mission is clear: To make online platforms a safe space, one post at a time. Chatstat. Investing in the future of online safety.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Education, Health Care, Information Technology, Internet Services, Messaging and Telecommunications, Software

Description: HAWA Therapeutics creates a novel treatment for muscle strain, damage, and dystrophy stimulating muscle stem cell functions.
Full Description: HAWA Therapeutics creates a novel treatment for muscle strain, damage, and dystrophy stimulating muscle stem cell functions. The treatment involves injecting HIF2ai inhibitors into the muscle, but the company is also exploring topical and oral approaches. Moderate and severe muscle strains can cause immense pain, causing people to be out of work for long periods of time. Treatment options are limited to physical therapy, surgery, and a host of short-term drugs such as anti-inflammatories. Severe strains often heal incompletely, making people susceptible to further injury.  HAWA’s HIF2Ai technology accelerates initial recovery and reduces recurrent injuries by preventing the formation of scar tissue.

Description: Novel wound drainage monitoring sensors + predictive tools for better patient outcomes
Full Description: Patients who experience complex high risk surgery or are expected to heal slowly are often managed with a wound drain. Current drain output monitoring practices are manual - nurses (in the hospital) and patients (at home) eyeball the color and volume. Inaccurate data means drains are usually installed longer than necessary and nurses and patients miss early onset of complications (infection, leaks, excessive bleeding, blockages). This results in longer lengths of stay and increased readmission rates. Medsix plans to sell a disposable sensor with predictive analytics that can be attached to any wound drain to automate monitoring. This will address the needs of patients (detect complications earlier; remove drains earlier; reduce overall recovery time), providers (improved clinical workflow and decision making; creating a standard for wound drain output) and payers (reduce length of stay; reduce readmission rates; increase reimbursements).
Headquarters Regions: Greater Boston Area, East Coast, New England
Industry Groups: Health Care

Full Description: DeployHub’s mission is to balance the risk of consuming open-source software with the need for rapid development and deployment. DeployHub inventories and fortifies the software supply chain, providing the needed fast response insights when a cyber attack hits. DeployHub’s core is based on Ortelius.io, an open-source project incubating at the Continuous Delivery Foundation (Linux Foundation). Unique to the DeployHub offering is its ability to gather and centralize DevOps and Security intelligence, with snapshots and versioning for each change made across the software supply chain. DeployHub defines an organization's software supply chain by aggregating critical data, like SBOMs, to the higher organizational levels, creating new versions of the supply chain data each time an underlying component changes. DeployHub's Open Source Supply Chain Security Platform eliminates confusion about the pieces of software your teams are consuming, supporting a rapid response to software supply chain attacks.
Headquarters Regions: Western US
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Software
Founders: Brian Dawson, Steve Taylor, Tracy Ragan

Description: SaaS Radar Data Platform for Weather and Threat Defense
Full Description: StormQuant has developed the industry’s first Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) multi-mission radar data platform. The solution makes hyperlocal data more accessible and scalable with its innovative IoT X-Band radar that is 10x lighter, 10x cheaper, and 2x more powerful: it’s faster to build, easier to maintain, and eliminates the power, network, terrain, and capital restrictions that limit radar coverage today.StormQuant deploys its radars in a mesh topology to increase resiliency and delivers the data in a SaaS model through the StormQuant Dashboard. This next-generation approach offers a new level of information: filling major coverage gaps by providing low altitude data largely missing today, enabling users to run custom weather and airspace scanning patterns on the fly, and seamlessly aggregating multiple data sources to deliver more precise adverse event profiles in high-fidelity 3D & 2D formats. The result is an exponentially more accurate and actionable threat prediction and detection capability that saves lives and property. StormQuant’s flexible, rapid system deployment features make the platform applicable, accessible, and adoptable on a global scale. The solution is developed and manufactured in the United States and directly contributes to expanding Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) programs.

Description: Citadels MC is MC club comprising active and retired members of law enforcement, military, first responders, and civilian MC enthusiasts.
Full Description: Citadels MC is an exclusive motorcycle club catering to dedicated and passionate riders who share a common bond. Our club consists of a diverse community, welcoming both active and retired members from law enforcement, military, first responders, as well as civilian motorcycle enthusiasts. We provide a platform for like-minded individuals to come together, form lifelong friendships, and engage in the exhilarating world of motorcycles. At Citadels MC, we understand the unique experiences and camaraderie that arise from serving in law enforcement, the military, and as first responders. We honor the dedication and sacrifice of our members, and our club serves as a place where they can find support, understanding, and a shared passion for motorcycles. Our club is not limited to professionals in uniform; we also embrace civilian motorcycle enthusiasts who possess a deep appreciation for the open road, two-wheeled machines, and the sense of freedom that comes with riding. Whether you are a seasoned rider or a novice, we welcome individuals from all walks of life who share a common love for motorcycles. As a member of Citadels MC, you gain access to a vibrant and active community that organizes regular rides, events, and gatherings. These experiences allow our members to forge strong bonds, exchange stories, and create memories that will last a lifetime. Our club fosters a sense of unity and belonging, providing a supportive network where riders can connect, share knowledge, and contribute to the broader motorcycle community. Join us today and become a part of a tight-knit community where friendship, adventure, and the love of motorcycles unite. Ride with purpose and ride with pride as a member of Citadels MC.
